stages.question: Add 2px solid black border to door and 1px solid black to doorknob.

stages.name: stage 12
stages.question: Using flex display on the wall to center the door and add 350px height and 600px width to the walls
stages.original_css:
.wall{border: 2px solid purple;height:350px;width:600px;background-color:pink}.door {border: 2px solid black;height: 180px;width: 100px;position:relative;display: flex;justify-content: space-around;flex-direction: column;}
 .doorKnob {border: 2px solid black;height:20px;width:20px;border-radius: 50%;}

 .doorKnob {background-color: yellow;border: 2px solid black;height:20px;width:20px;border-radius: 50%;}
